title: I had the worst luck for placements.
body:
So I finished my placements last night and I don't agree with the match making system anymore. If gold players are getting sent back to silver then actual silver/bronze players should not be in our games. and to put 3-4 actual silver players in a team is unfair and I felt sorry for 2 people in one of my games because I solo carried the game with full tank ornn top. 

I just want to know if riot thinks their system works or if its a thing they're looking to try and sort out this year. 

I plan on getting to diamond this year, but I was having better luck winning last year than I was this year and I feel that I'm ALWAYS with "bots" and I know this gets said a lot and my final scores at the end of the game don't help me, but i'd rather have a crack instead of sitting back and leaving my score to look good so I can bitch about others. or maybe I should've listened to my mate (InMySight) he's a challenger player and always tries to tell me to wait a month play on one of your smurfs...
